ForecastingCustomCategory.name: ForecastingCustomCategory
ForecastingCustomCategory.description: Represents a custom forecasting category used for forecast rollups.

CanHaveQuotas.description: Indicates whether forecasts in the custom category can have quotas. The default value is false. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

Description.description: A user-defined description of the custom category.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the custom category.

DisplayPosition.description: Indicates the placement of the custom category column among the other columns on the forecasts page.

ForecastingSourceDefinitionId.description: The ID of the forecasting source definition.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the related ForecastingType.

IsAdjustable.description: Indicates whether forecast managers can adjust forecasts in the custom category. The default value is false.

IsAmount.description: If true, then the adjustment is made in a revenue amount. If false, then IsQuantity must be true. The default value is false. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

IsHidden.description: Indicates whether the custom category is hidden. The default value is false. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

IsOwnerAdjustable.description: Indicates whether all forecast users can adjust their own forecasts in the custom category, including the territory forecasts that they own. The default value is false.

IsQuantity.description: If true, then the adjustment is made in a quantity amount. If false, then IsAmount must be true. The default value is false. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

Language.description: The language of the custom category.

MasterLabel.description: The label for this column. The label is in the default language locale for the organization. If thereâ€™s no default language locale, the label is in en_US.

MeasureFieldOverride.description: The measure that this custom category supports.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the specified custom category measure. Available in API version 63.0 and later.
